      • initializeCronJob

        public static org.quartz.JobDetail initializeCronJob​(IViewerJob goobiJob,
                                                     org.quartz.Scheduler sched)
                                              throws org.quartz.SchedulerException
        initializes given IViewerJob to run at specified times
        Parameters:
        cronConfiguration - e.g. "0 0 10 ? * *" for 10 AM every day. The time is based on the server time
        See {@link https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E12058_01/doc/doc.1014/e12030/cron_expressions.htm}
        Throws:
        org.quartz.SchedulerException
